translation.Diamond_price/carat: Diamond Price in hundreds US$ Per Carat
translation.TNC_description:
Diamond calculator is created to assist users in determining the estimated price range for diamonds based on available criteria eg: Color, Carat, Clarity and shape. The price shown is an estimate based on the updated diamond price. We are not responsible for any losses caused by the use of this application. Thank you for using this app. 

For more information please visit Crane Inc.
translation.Error_Detail1: Price not available. Please try another combinations
translation.versionCheckContent: You will have to update your app to the latest version to continue using.
